title: Covid Texting Service
description: Texting service that provide basic statistics and  question-answering functionality about COVID-19.
Originally built for those without Internet access to get information about the pandemic.
Currently working with nonprofit Silicon Harlem in NYC to get the service in the hands of people in need.

title: Joseon Munkwa Project
description: Analyze Korean aristocratic historical figures and civil service officials and perform disambiguation on historical records.
I am working as a research assistant with the Big Data Studies Lab at Seoul National University.

title: Virtual Coffeeshop
description: Virtual coffeeshop experience for those of us stuck at home during stay-at-home and seeking the vibe and comradeship of a cafe.

title: Music Factorization
description: Factorize a scale into parts that can be understood using combinations of 'symmetric' scales.

title: Which White Male?
description: Determine which male white writer from the 19/20th century your writing most resembles using basic NLP models.

title: Spam Classifier
description: Simple image classifier built using fastai.
